functional.req: System shall create optimal task execution sequences based on dependencies, risk, and value
System shall ensure each task provides measurable value when completed
System shall validate that completed tasks work together before proceeding
System shall provide rollback capability for each incremental step
System shall manage feature flags for controlled rollout
System shall automatically test each incremental task in CI pipeline
System shall track cumulative value delivery and remaining work
System shall adapt sequencing based on feedback and changing priorities

acceptance-criteria.criteria: System creates optimal task execution sequences based on dependencies, risk, and value delivery
Incremental delivery strategy ensures each task provides measurable value when completed
Integration checkpoints validate that completed tasks work together before proceeding
Rollback capability exists for each incremental step to maintain system stability
Feature flags enable/disable completed tasks for controlled rollout
Continuous integration pipeline automatically tests each incremental task
Progress tracking shows cumulative value delivery and remaining work
Task sequencing adapts based on feedback and changing priorities

test-scenarios.scenario: Task sequence optimized for value delivery
Feature flags enable controlled feature rollout
Adaptive sequencing responds to priority changes
